remarks: Value of the function ` F ` , the divisor sum of a Dirichlet character.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum2.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
rpvmasum2.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
rpvmasum2.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchrisum0f.f $e |- F = ( b e. NN |-> sum_ v e. { q e. NN | q || b } ( X ` ( L ` v ) ) ) $.
dchrisum0fval $p |- ( A e. NN -> ( F ` A ) = sum_ t e. { q e. NN | q || A } ( X ` ( L ` t ) ) ) $.
$d .1. t $.
$d A b q t v $.
$d D t $.
$d F t $.
$d L b t v $.
$d N q t $.
$d X b t v $.
